ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: SoWr in primary, Dirk in melee 2 - then do not pass go but immediately camp predator in Sol-A until he drops an Obscene Shard for you.  Then OS in melee 2
ygData.messageBody:
SoWr in primary, Dirk in melee 2 - then do not pass "go" but immediately
camp predator in Sol-A until he drops an Obscene Shard for you. Then OS in
melee 2 and Dirk in range until you can get a Runed Bone Fork for your range
slot.

SoWr 48dd proc
OS 30dd proc (ok, so go stabb froogys if the gobbies resist ya too much.)

Sylly

p.s. Necralia, our lev 50 Necro, gives Gnoll Hide Lariats to her pets <eg>

> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> Okay experts - I forget the theories, formulas etc - just want some
simple advice. Just got the Staff of Writhing for 400p - So I now have -
Staff of Writhing; Brazen Brass Kilij; Dragoon Dirk; and a Gnoll Hide
Lariat.
>
